Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Enable screen saver (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Default screensaver behaviour. Additional mitigations in place.
Notes: Win - OIB - SC - Device Security - U - Power and Device Lock

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'MSS: (AutoAdminLogon) Enable Automatic Logon (not recommended)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Breaks Autopilot.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'MSS: (SafeDllSearchMode) Enable Safe DLL search mode (recommended)' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'MSS: (WarningLevel) Percentage threshold for the security event log at which the system will generate a warning' is set to 'Enabled: 90% or less'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Auditing configured to rotate logs.
Notes: Win - OIB - SC - Device Security - D - Audit and Event Logging

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off multicast name resolution' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Breaks DNS-SD used in Delivery Optimization.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Prohibit use of Internet Connection Sharing on your DNS domain network' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Alternative mitigation in place.
Notes: Win - OIB - SC - Device Security - D - Security Hardening

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Hardened UNC Paths' is set to 'Enabled, with Require Mutual Authentication and Require Integrity set for all NETLOGON and SYSVOL shares'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off toast notifications on the lock screen (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Alternative mitigation in place.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Include command line in process creation events' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Sensitive information could be gathered and viewed by standard users, as documented by CIS.
Notes: Use an appropriate EDR which would capture this securely.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Prevent device metadata retrieval from the Internet' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Standard users can already not install software that requires elevation.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Configure registry policy processing: Do not apply during periodic background processing' is set to 'Enabled: FALSE'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Configure registry policy processing: Process even if the Group Policy objects have not changed' is set to 'Enabled: TRUE'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Configure security policy processing: Do not apply during periodic background processing' is set to 'Enabled: FALSE'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Configure security policy processing: Process even if the Group Policy objects have not changed' is set to 'Enabled: TRUE'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Continue experiences on this device' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Alternative mitigation in place.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Block user from showing account details on sign-in' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Significantly impacts WHfB experience.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Do not display network selection UI' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Potentially impacts user experience. Dubious security value. Requires physical device access.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Do not enumerate connected users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Enumerate local users on domain-joined computers' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off picture password sign-in' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Functionality not available by default, superceded by Windows Hello.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn on convenience PIN sign-in' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Functionality not available by default, superceded by Windows Hello.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Allow network connectivity during connected-standby (on battery)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Allow network connectivity during connected-standby (plugged in)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Enable Windows NTP Server' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Functionality not available by default. Standard users cannot enable NTP server capabilities.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Do not preserve zone information in file attachments (User)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Notify antivirus programs when opening attachments (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Responsibility of AV/EDR Product.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Prevent the use of security questions for local accounts' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: The only local account available is managed via LAPS.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off shell protocol protected mode' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Configure local setting override for reporting to Microsoft MAPS' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off Microsoft Defender Antivirus' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Prevent users from sharing files within their profile. (User)' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Functionality no longer exists.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Do not delete temp folders upon exit' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn off the offer to update to the latest version of Windows' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Managed via Autopatch/WUfB rings.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Sign-in and lock last interactive user automatically after a restart' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Net positive on user experience and benefits patch compliance without user interruption. Only enabled when BitLocker is on and not suspended.
Notes: Win - OIB - SC - Device Security - D - Login and Lock Screen

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Turn on PowerShell Transcription' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Sensitive information could be gathered and viewed by standard users, as documented by CIS.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Alphanumeric Device Password Required' is set to 'Password, Numeric PIN, or Alphanumeric PIN required'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Device Password Expiration' is set to '365 or fewer days, but not 0'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Device Password History' is set to '24 or more password(s)'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Min Device Password Complex Characters' is set to 'Digits lowercase letters and uppercase letters are required'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Min Device Password Length' is set to '14 or more character(s)'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Minimum Password Age' is set to '1 or more day(s)'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation. Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Disable Consumer Account State Content' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Alternative mitigation in place.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Do not show feedback notifications' is set to 'Feedback notifications are disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/microsoft-365/admin/misc/feedback-user-control

Setting Name: (L1) Configure 'Accounts: Rename administrator account'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Security by obscurity. https://skiptotheendpoint.co.uk/dot-slash-administrator-a-security-risk-analysis/

Setting Name: (L1) Configure 'Accounts: Rename guest account'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Guest account is disabled and disallowed for login by policy.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Interactive logon: Do not display last signed-in' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Breaks Windows Hello by causing the user to always have to enter their credentials.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Interactive logon: Do not require CTRL+ALT+DEL' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Significantly impacts WHfB experience.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Interactive logon: Machine inactivity limit' is set to '900 or fewer second(s), but not 0'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Setting deprecated. Mitigated elsewhere.

Setting Name: (L1) Configure 'Interactive logon: Message text for users attempting to log on'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Can break Autopilot and preprovisioning. Unnecessary extra steps for users when they don't read it anyway.
Notes: Organisation Acceptable Use Policy signed to get an account.

Setting Name: (L1) Configure 'Interactive logon: Message title for users attempting to log on'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Can break Autopilot and preprovisioning. Unnecessary extra steps for users when they don't read it anyway.
Notes: Organisation Acceptable Use Policy signed to get an account.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Microsoft network server: Digitally sign communications (if client agrees)' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: LEGACY POLICY

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Network access: Restrict clients allowed to make remote calls to SAM' is set to 'Administrators: Remote Access: Allow'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Network security: Allow Local System to use computer identity for NTLM' is set to 'Allow'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Network Security: Allow PKU2U authentication requests' is set to 'Block'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour. Not relevant for Entra joined devices.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Network security: Restrict NTLM: Audit Incoming NTLM Traffic' is set to 'Enable auditing for all accounts'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Not relevant for Entra joined devices.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'User Account Control: Behavior of the elevation prompt for standard users' is set to 'Automatically deny elevation requests'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Negatively impacts most Helpdesk BAU activities and remote support and troubleshooting.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Require Private Store Only' is set to 'Only Private store is enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Being removed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Input Personalization' is set to 'Block'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Negatively impacts users with accessibility needs.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Search To Use Location' is set to 'Block'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Negatively impacts user experience. Location & Privacy permissions managed separately.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Allow Telemetry' is set to 'Basic'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Telemetry is not scary.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Enable OneSettings Auditing' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enforces default behaviour.
Notes: Use an appropriate EDR which would capture this securely.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Limit Diagnostic Log Collection' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Diagnostics and telemetry already being collected by Intune.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Limit Dump Collection' is set to 'Enabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Telemetry is not scary.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Internet Connection Sharing (ICS) (SharedAccess)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Service disabling not available via policy.
Notes: Win - OIB - SC - Device Security - D - Security Hardening

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Remote Procedure Call (RPC) Locator (RpcLocator)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Service disabling not available via policy.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'SSDP Discovery (SSDPSRV)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Service disabling not available via policy.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'UPnP Device Host (upnphost)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Service disabling not available via policy.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Windows Media Player Network Sharing Service (WMPNetworkSvc)' is set to 'Disabled' or 'Not Installed'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Service disabling not available via policy.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Windows Mobile Hotspot Service (icssvc)' is set to 'Disabled'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Service disabling not available via policy.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Hypervisor Enforced Code Integrity' is set to 'Enabled with UEFI lock'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Enabled Without UEFI Lock which is default behaviour on Win11 22H2 and above. Being changed in next CIS benchmark.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Disallow Exploit Protection Override' is set to '(Enable)'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Standard users cannot edit/remove Exploit Protection settings.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Defer Feature Updates Period in Days' is set to 'Enabled: 180 or more days'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Managed via Autopatch/WUfB rings.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Defer Quality Updates Period (Days)' is set to 'Enabled: 0 days'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Managed via Autopatch/WUfB rings.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Manage preview builds' is set to 'Disable Preview builds'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Managed via Autopatch/WUfB rings.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Scheduled Install Day' is set to 'Every day'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Managed via Autopatch/WUfB rings.

Setting Name: (L1) Ensure 'Password Complexity' is set to 'Large letters + small letters + numbers + special characters'
OIB Rationale for Non-Implementation: Password policy managed by Entra. Negatively impacts WHfB PIN creation.
